issue.message: When targeting Android 13 or higher, posting a permission requires holding the `POST_NOTIFICATIONS` permission (usage from org.fossify.commons.asynctasks.CopyMoveTask)
Attribute `enableOnBackInvokedCallback` is only used in API level 33 and higher (current min is 26)
Attribute `enableOnBackInvokedCallback` is only used in API level 33 and higher (current min is 26)
The application should not provide its own launch screen

issue.errorLine1:
<string name="main_donation_text">Fossify is funded by users like you!

Your donations fuel improvements and new features. We appreciate your support—please consider contributing!

Thank you!</string>
